title: MTGGoldfish
description:
Magic the Gathering decks, reviews and product openings! The official channel for MTGGoldfish. Visit us at http://www.mtggoldfish.com.

Upload schedule for Major Series:
Sunday: Meme or Dream? 
Monday: Budget Magic, MTGGoldfish Podcast

Wednesday: Against the Odds
Thursday: Arena Series with Crim
Friday: Much Abrew About Nothing
Saturday: Arena Series with Crim

videos.author: MTGGoldfish
videos.title: You Don't Need to Build Around Ugin At All
videos.description:
Ugin might read like in a way to where you'd load your deck up with a bunch of random colorless spells but Ugin might just be good on his own! This Golgari Ramp shell will test that. 

Today's video is brought to you by Card Kingdom. You can pick up some Magic: the Gathering cards (and help support the show) at https://www.cardkingdom.com/mtggoldfish

► Read more about this deck (full article): https://www.mtggoldfish.com/articles/single-scoop-you-don-t-need-to-build-around-ugin-at-all
► View this deck with the latest prices: https://www.mtggoldfish.com/deck/7060903#paper

◼ Purchase this deck (paper): http://mtg.fish/7qjaN
◼ Purchase this deck (Magic Online): http://mtg.fish/hnjkc
